import React,{useState} from 'react' import Nav from '../../../components/layout' import Link from 'next/link' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' import axios from 'axios' const Index = ()=>{ const [value,setValue] = useState(null) const router = useRouter() const {tid} = router.query axios.get(`https://test.ipdb.io/api/v1/assets/?search=${tid}`) .then(({data})=>setValue(data[0].data.input)) return( <>


Record
  • Blood Pressure: {value && value.bp}
  • Diabetics?: {value && value.diabetics}
  • Smoke?: {value && value.smoke}
  • Drink?: {value && value.drink}
  • Admission?: {value && value.admission}
  • Medication?: {value && value.medication}
) } export default Index
